segments.text: I really like the apartment , but I was wondering if I could change some things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What would you like to change ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like to have different carpet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would be willing to put in a different color carpet if you pay the price difference .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much more would it cost ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It would cost between 2 and 10 dollars more per square yard .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: While I am at it , would it be possible to switch paint colors ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would be willing to look at a different color . You need to bring me a sample .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When can my apartment be painted and ready to go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can have the new carpet and paint by next Monday .
segments.speaker: S2
